episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4001_1001:
There we go! Nothing like a thorough polishing
to get you clean and gleaming as ever, Steelix!
But I wish I knew why you seem so down...

Hi, Serena. I see [Name:PlayerNickname ] is
with you, too.

Sorry if we startled you. It’s just that you seemed
worried about something.

Well, to tell you the truth, it seems like Steelix
is feeling a little dejected today.

I check on her every day while I’m polishing her,
so I can tell when something’s wrong.

I can see why that worries you. I wish there was
something I could do to help...
I know! Why don’t we make a delicious cake?

In Kalos, we make desserts that can cheer up our
Pokémon and strengthen our bonds with them.

I think eating desserts is a good way to fill
Pokémon and their Trainers with joy.
I’ll do anything if it’ll cheer up Steelix!

All right! Let’s get ready to make a cake! I hope
you’ll help, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4002_1001:
This forest looks like the perfect place for us
to gather the ingredients for the cake!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4002_0401:
Because I want to use fresh Berries to make
the cake.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4002_0302: We can’t get them in town?
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4002_0402:
Nope! I want to use fresh Berries to make
the cake.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4002_1001:
I’m sure I can whip up something delicious.
Just leave it to me!
Oh, it looks like someone is training over there.

What? You missed? Well, that’s OK. Everyone has
off days.

Ahhh! Serena?! I-I’m sorry. I was so caught up in
our training...

Don’t worry about it. You seem to be having fun
training with Gallade.

I am! Our goal is to train together and get
stronger, after all!
But he seems a little out of it today.
Usually, he understands exactly what I’m thinking...
Oh! So it wasn’t just my Steelix.

In that case...maybe we should make a big cake!
One big enough for a party!

If we’re all having fun together, Steelix and the
other Pokémon might cheer up, too.
Um... Could I help out with that party, too?

I’m always relying on Gallade. This is my chance
to help him out for a change.
Hehe. Of course! Let’s do it together!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4003_1001:
Thanks to everyone’s help, we managed to gather
all the ingredients we need.

This should be enough for us to make a big
cake, but...
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4003_0401: We don’t have a cake pan that’s the right size.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4003_0402:
I just realized that I need to look for a cake pan
that’s the right size.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4003_1001: I hope we can find one in a shop around here.

Well...why don’t we split into two groups and look
for one?

That may be faster than going to each shop as
one big group.
Good idea!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] can go with me, and
you and Wally can go together, Jasmine.
OK!

Hey, how about that row of shops over there?
Let’s go down the line and check out each one!
Hehe! We did it! We found the perfect cake pan.

I’m glad we visited all those shops, even if it did
take a while. Now we need to hurry and meet up
with Jasmine—
Oh! Look!
U-um! Elesa!

I’ve been a huge fan of yours for such a long
time! You’re so glamorous!

Hehe. Thank you. I’m actually on my way to the
arena to have a Pokémon battle.
Good luck!

Let’s get together sometime and continue
this conversation.
Wow... Elesa is so cool.
What’s wrong, Fennekin?
What?! Our bag of ingredients is gone!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_1001:
I’m so sorry. It’s all my fault—I shouldn’t have let
myself get distracted.
And after we worked so hard to gather them...

In fact, it’s thanks to you that we’re working hard
to do something nice for our Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_0301: Let’s go look for those ingredients!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_0401:
Yeah...you’re right. Now’s not the time to get
down on myself.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_0302: Whoever did this is gonna pay!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_0402:
Yeah, that’s right. Now’s not the time to get down
on myself.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4004_1001:
We need to do something about this so we can
cheer up our Pokémon!

Let’s track down whoever stole the ingredients
and get them back!
Yes! I’m sure we can do it!
Someone might’ve seen the thief take them.

A white bag? Oh! Now that you mention it, I did
see that!

Some masked men came running this way, and
they were carrying a white bag.

That has to be it. And masked men can
only mean...

I have a good idea where Team Break might
be hiding.
A-are we going to fight them?

Probably, if it comes to that. But they should
understand if we explain the situation to them.

As long as they haven’t done anything else bad,
we can let them off the hook this time if they just
give us back our ingredients.

You’re right. But there’s no telling what Team
Break might do...
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4005_1001: Yes. That’s very important to us.

Those are ingredients we gathered to cheer up
our Pokémon.
So, give them back to us!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4005_0401: Nyahaha! Can’t do that, I’m afraid! Tough luck!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4005_0402:
Nyahaha! You really wanna know? All right,
I guess I can tell you.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4005_1001:
As far as we’re concerned, gloomy Pokémon
are a golden opportunity.

Makes it SO much easier for us to steal ’em from
their Trainers!

I can’t believe you... Don’t you know how hard
it is for Trainers when their Pokémon are
feeling down?

If you’re going to keep doing things that
upset people...

then I’m going to show you just how upset I am
through a Pokémon battle! And no matter what,
I won’t lose!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_1101:
After beating Team Break and taking back the
ingredients, Serena and her friends finished making
the cake.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_1001: Wow! Something smells really sweet and tasty!

I think my Pokémon came out to see what smells
so yummy, too!

There’s enough for everyone. Eat as much as
you like!
Hehe! It looks like Steelix has cheered right up!
She’s absolutely sparkling now! Clang! Hehehe!

Gallade seems to be back to his old self
again, too.

He should be able to understand exactly what I’m
feeling now!

*gasp* Look, you guys! It’s Elesa! And Brock!
And they’re both in their sygna suits!
You all look like you’re having a good time!
Hehe. Mind if we join you?
O-of course not! Please help yourselves.
Oh wow! This...this cake is delicious!

Nothing makes me happier after a good battle
than eating some delicious cake.
Hehe. You really like it, too, don’t you, Rotom?

Oh! Did you and Brock just have a battle, Elesa?
I would have loved to see that!

I guess the cake was a success, then!
Thanks for your help, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I couldn’t have done this without you.
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_0301: I’m glad this cheered everyone up!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_0401:
Me, too! Don’t underestimate the power
of desserts!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_0302: The power of desserts is amazing!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_0402:
Yes, it is! Don’t underestimate the power
of desserts!
episode_event_ch0130_00_serena/4006_1001:
Still, seeing everyone here having so much
fun together...

I can’t help but think that this might actually be the
best way to cheer up our Pokémon!
